page_title.home: Cherry Studio - The All-in-One AI Assistant
page_title.download: Download Cherry Studio - Multi-Platform AI Client
page_title.enterprise: Cherry Studio Enterprise - Enterprise AI Solutions
page_title.theme: Cherry Studio Theme Library - Customize Your AI Assistant

page_description.home: Cherry Studio AI is a powerful multi-model AI assistant supporting iOS, macOS, and Windows platforms. Quickly switch between multiple advanced LLM models to boost work and study efficiency.
page_description.download: Download Cherry Studio AI client supporting Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms. Integrates 100+ AI models, completely free and open source.
page_description.enterprise: Cherry Studio Enterprise provides private deployment AI productivity platform for modern teams and enterprises, supporting model management, permission control, and data security.
page_description.theme: Discover and share beautiful Cherry Studio themes to personalize your AI assistant interface. Supports both light and dark mode themes.

contribution.title: I want to contribute to the project, what can I do?
contribution.description: If you like our project, please give us a star on <1>Github</1> to simply support us. If you are a technical expert, you are welcome to become one of our contributors. Of course, you can also participate in our documentation editing, share your experience with everyone, or answer questions for other users in the community. If you have any ideas or suggestions, please contact us via GitHub Issues or in the official community.

banner.multi_provider_client: AI conversation client with multi-provider integration
banner.multi_provider_description: Cherry Studio currently supports the integration of most service providers on the market and supports unified scheduling of models from multiple service providers.
banner.no_privacy_leak: No need to worry about privacy leakage
banner.local_storage_description: All your usage data is stored locally and will not be uploaded to any third-party servers, and it supports model calls deployed locally.
banner.knowledge_base_description: Cherry Studio has now launched the knowledge base function, which supports importing files in various formats and importing web pages to build your personalized knowledge base.

features.title: Main Features Introduction
features.description: The following is only a partial introduction to the features. For more features, you can download the client to experience, or learn more in the <1>Official Documentation</1>.

conversation.title: Large Model Conversation
conversation.description: In addition to basic AI conversations, it can also help you with document or image conversations, and even formula and HTML previews.

drawing.title: AI Drawing
drawing.description: Supports a variety of drawing models, so you can give full play to your imagination and let Cherry Studio help you complete it.

translation.title: AI Translation
translation.description: Whether it's the translation page or the conversation bar, Cherry Studio can quickly translate the content you enter.

assistants.title: Over a Thousand Built-in Assistants
assistants.description: Cherry Studio has built-in thousands of assistants in various categories, making you more efficient when using large models.

knowledge_base.title: Multi-source Knowledge Base
knowledge_base.description: Whether it's a local file or a web page, it can be used as a knowledge source to quickly build your exclusive knowledge base.

backup.title: Multiple Backup Methods
backup.description: Including local backup and cloud backup, worry-free switching between multiple devices, more convenient and safer.

intro.title: Project Introduction
intro.description: Cherry Studio is a multi-platform AI client that supports Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms, with mobile support coming in the future. Since July 2024, the project has iterated hundreds of versions. We are committed to creating a more efficient, secure, and user-friendly client that allows more people to enjoy the convenience of AI.

goal.title: Cherry Studio's Goals
goal.description: Cherry Studio is dedicated to allowing users to focus on creation or enjoying the convenience of AI, rather than being shut out by various complicated configurations. Therefore, you only need to fill in the API key to start using it immediately. We also provide detailed usage documentation for your reference and learning. Our community is also very active and can quickly help you solve various usage problems.

contribution.title: I want to contribute to the project, what can I do?
contribution.description: If you like our project, welcome to give us a star on <1>Github</1> to simply support us. If you are a technical expert, you are welcome to become one of our contributors. Of course, you can also participate in our documentation editing to share your usage experience with everyone or help answer questions for other users in the community. If you have any ideas or suggestions, feel free to contact us through GitHub Issues or in the official community.

footer.description: Cherry Studio is a multi-platform AI client, and we are committed to allowing more people to enjoy the convenience brought by AI.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.contact_info: If you have any questions, you can check the documentation or ask in the community first.<0/>Or email us at <1>support@cherry-ai.com</1>

footer.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Shanghai Qianhui Technology Co., Ltd. <1>沪ICP备2021031071号-3</1>

sponsors.title: Cherry Studio has a variety of service providers built-in
sponsors.subtitle: It also supports connecting to other service providers compatible with the API format of OpenAI/Anthropic.

download_page.version_error: Failed to get version info, please download from the cloud drive temporarily

intel_version.title: Cherry Studio Intel Core™ Ultra Edition
intel_version.subtitle: Localized AI solution deeply optimized for Intel hardware
intel_version.description: Optimized for Intel Core™ Ultra processors, providing you with a true local AI experience

local_model.title: Local Large Model Running Capability
local_model.description: No need to connect to the cloud, run Qwen3-4B, 8B, and even 14B language models of different parameter scales smoothly on your device

long_context.title: Long Context Processing
long_context.description: Support up to 32K context window, enabling AI to understand and process long documents or complex conversation history for more in-depth content generation and analysis

knowledge_base.title: Local Knowledge Base Construction
knowledge_base.description: Integrated with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology, users can import personal documents and databases into the device, making AI a personal assistant that has learned your exclusive knowledge

protocol_extension.title: Protocol Extension Capability
protocol_extension.description: Implemented MCP (Model Context Protocol) extension, leaving interfaces for more diverse AI applications and developer ecosystem in the future

hero.title: Cherry Studio Enterprise
hero.subtitle: AI productivity and management platform built for modern teams and enterprises

features.title: Core Advantages
features.subtitle: Professional enterprise-grade features to help teams improve productivity

model_management.title: Unified Model Management
model_management.description: Centrally access and manage various cloud large models, support local private deployment, employees can use without configuration

knowledge_base.title: Enterprise-grade Knowledge Base
knowledge_base.description: Build and manage team shared knowledge base, AI interaction based on unified knowledge to improve answer quality

permission_control.title: Fine-grained Permission Control
permission_control.description: Unified management backend, role-based permission allocation, flexible resource access control

private_deployment.title: Complete Private Deployment
private_deployment.description: Support enterprise internal server deployment, private cloud environment deployment, 100% private and controllable data

backend_service.title: Reliable Backend Service
backend_service.description: Provide stable API services, enterprise-grade data backup and recovery mechanisms to ensure business continuity

security_compliance.title: Security and Compliance Assurance
security_compliance.description: Meet the strictest data security and compliance requirements, support audit logs, ensure traceable data usage

comparison.title: Version Comparison
comparison.subtitle: Choose the best plan for your team

beta.title: Beta Notice
beta.description: The Enterprise Edition is currently in public beta. We are continuously optimizing features. If you encounter issues or have suggestions, please feel free to provide feedback!

download.title: Client Download
download.description: For the complete experience, please download the Enterprise Edition client:

manual.title: User Manual
manual.description: Thank you for participating in the Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition experience program. We provide detailed user manuals to help you quickly get started with all features.

support.title: Get Support
support.description: If you are interested in Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition, please contact our business team

theme_page.title: Theme Market
theme_page.subtitle: Discover and share Cherry Studio themes

search_help_tips.tag_search: Use #keyword to search for content containing that tag
search_help_tips.author_search: Use @author to search for a specific author
search_help_tips.combined_search: Supports combined search, separate # @ search content with spaces

notifications.not_found_tag: No themes found with this tag
notifications.not_found_author: No themes found by this author
notifications.data_fetch_error: Failed to load data, please try again later

submit_modal.title: Submit Theme
submit_modal.version_hint: Format: numbers and dots, e.g., 1.0 or 1.2.3
submit_modal.cdn_link_placeholder: If you provide a public CDN link or file link, you can fill it in
submit_modal.image_format_hint: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP formats, max 2MB, recommended aspect ratio 16:9, non-compliant images will be cropped.
submit_modal.preview_background_hint: Preview images should include background outside the window, example image:
submit_modal.tags_placeholder: Enter tags then press Enter, separate multiple tags with commas
submit_modal.tags_hint: Tags don't support punctuation, only Chinese, English and numbers
submit_modal.success_message: Your theme has been submitted for review, we will process it as soon as possible.

validation.light_image_required: Please upload light mode preview image
validation.dark_image_required: Please upload dark mode preview image
validation.file_type_error: Please upload a correct image file format

agents_page.title: Agent Marketplace
agents_page.subtitle: Discover and share agents, apply them to your Cherry Studio with one click
